titles.title: Providing for consideration of motions to suspend the rules.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 106-475, by Mr. Dreier.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 160.

bill.summary: 11/17/1999--Introduced. Makes it in order at any time on November 18, 1999, for the Speaker of the House of Representatives to entertain motions that the House suspend the rules.
